bug.short_desc: Integrating the widgetbrowser as library (within created contrib) doesn't work anymore

long_desc.thetext:
Following the steps of this manual page doesn't work anymore:
http://manual.qooxdoo.org/4.1/pages/desktop/ui_using_widgetbrowser_for_theme_development.html
Here is the relevant mailing list issue:
http://qooxdoo.678.n2.nabble.com/qx-v4-1-contrib-integration-of-the-widgetbrowser-does-not-work-td7587134.html
The culprit is this (merge) commit: 48515ad5eebf850136d73b99bd3b5174225cf15b
This means, that the functionality was broken within the "pointer" branch. At first glance that's puzzling because within this commit no widgetbrowser or python code chances are happening. :/
